hotels.title: Family-Friendly Japan Escape Near Famous Pine Forest and One Hour From Fukuoka
hotels.description: Discover Japan's beautiful Fukuoka region with a stay at this contemporary hotel, located an hour from the city in the quaint town of Karatsu. The perfect spot to make your home base, this retreat is just minutes away from an array of attractions, including the gorgeous Karatsu Castle surrounded by cherry blossom trees and the iconic Nijinomatsubara pine forest. Awake each day with breakfast at Locavore restaurant, delivering both Japanese and Western favourites, then visit the local convenience store downstairs for a snack. When you feel like relaxing, you need not stray far, with an onsen-style bath and sauna onsite to soothe tired muscles.
